title: 164: How to Make Fast Great Decisions with David Meltzer
description:
How do you make great decisions fast? Have you ever thought about how you make decisions and how to optimize that process? 

I have a very special guest today, David Meltzer, who is a speaker, author, entrepreneur, podcast host and the founder of Sports1 Marketing.

He coached high-profile clients all around the world and he's in the studio today to share with us how to improve our decision-making abilities.

In today’s conversation, David will explain why knowing your values is key to the best decision making, and how we can reduce the amount of time we spend agonizing over decisions.

He will give us some practical tips to improve our decisions on a daily basis, and some quick exercises we can do anytime to boost our decision-making ability.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
